code: import React from'react';import{TrashIcon,ArrowDownTrayIcon}from'@heroicons/react/24/outline';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SavedRoutesList=_ref=>{let{savedRoutes,onLoadRoute,onDeleteRoute}=_ref;if(savedRoutes.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center py-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-base-content/60",children:"Inga sparade rutter \xE4n"})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-2 sm:space-y-3",children:savedRoutes.map(route=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card bg-base-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-body p-2 sm:p-3 lg:p-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col sm:flex-row sm:justify-between sm:items-center gap-2 sm:gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex-1 min-w-0",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"font-semibold text-base-content mb-1 text-sm sm:text-base truncate",children:route.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-xs sm:text-sm text-base-content/70",children:[route.addresses.length," adresser \u2022 Sparad ",new Date(route.updated_at).toLocaleDateString('sv-SE')]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex gap-2 justify-end sm:justify-start",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>onLoadRoute(route.id),className:"btn btn-primary btn-xs sm:btn-sm flex-1 sm:flex-none",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArrowDownTrayIcon,{className:"w-3 h-3 sm:w-4 sm:h-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"hidden sm:inline",children:"Ladda"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"sm:hidden",children:"Ladda"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onDeleteRoute(route.id,route.name),className:"btn btn-error btn-xs sm:btn-sm",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TrashIcon,{className:"w-3 h-3 sm:w-4 sm:h-4"})})]})]})})},route.id))});};export default SavedRoutesList;
